item.description:
A few friends and I have been doing the Coastal Wine Trail this year, and I thought it would be fun to continue the pattern with a meetup! Our meetup group visited Newport and Greenvale vineyards in October and had a great time!

The Coastal Wine Trail connects 9 wineries between Cape Cod and Westerly, RI. By visiting each winery, you can earn a stamp on a booklet that you then mail in (or turn in to a winery) to earn a chance to win a cruise, a getaway to the cape, or free wine!
More details here: http://www.coastalwin...

Today, we will visit Westport Rivers Vineyard (in Westport, MA) and Sakonnet Vineyards (in Little Compton, RI).

We will meet at the Westport Rivers Vineyard and Winery at 12:45 and take the 1pm tour. We will then do a tasting, which is $7 and includes the glass. Here are more details about Westport Rivers:
http://www.westportri...

We will then drive about 25 min to Sakonnet Vineyards in Little Compton. We will do a tasting and take the tour at 3pm. Here is more information about Sakonnet: http://www.sakonnetwi...

We will finish our day with a late lunch/early dinner at The Four Corners Grille in Tiverton (up the road from Sakonnet, going back towards the highway).

It should be a fun day! Hope to see you there.
This event is cross-listed with WINGS. Please RSVP on just one meetup site.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me inside -- tall, shoulder-length brown hair, thick glasses

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: South Coast Wine Trail
